title: Real GDP growth outpaces population growth

content.question: Assume that a nationâ€™s real gross domestic product (GDP) grows at a higher rate than its population over a given period of time. It can be concluded that

choices.label: the population will grow at a faster rate in the future
real GDP per capita has increased
real GDP will rise at a slower rate in the future
real GDP will rise at a faster rate in the future

content.answer: real GDP per capita has increased

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
